Class SimpleNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • ast.SimpleNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class SimpleNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node

      • SimpleNode

        public SimpleNode(int i)
        Constructor with ID. This is not in use by the main parser class.
        Parameters:
        i - the ID of the node.

      • SimpleNode

        public SimpleNode(JDCParser p,
                  int i)
        Constructor with parser - this is the one in use. Should not be called manually - called automatically by parser.JDCParser.
        Parameters:
        p - the parser
        i - the ID of the node (automatic)

      • print

        protected void print(Token t,
                     java.io.PrintWriter ostr)
        Prints a token with all its preceding Special Tokens (white space and comments). This method was already provided.
        Parameters:
        t - - the token to print
        ostr - - the PrintWriter to print to

      • process

        public void process(java.io.PrintWriter ostr)
        Processes the contents of the node. Set the node's indentation level, check whether it needs indenting, then print its contents. Finally, process all the node's children.
        Parameters:
        ostr - the output stream to print to.
